title: Isua hnenah puan var sinin
lyrics:
Isua hnenah puan var sinin,
Thih lui piahah kan intawk ang;
Hrehawm lovin kan be thei ang,
Inthen kan hlau tawh lovanga;
Thihna lui kai hnuah.

Thihna lui kai hnuah, (3)
Kan inthen tawh lovang; (4)
Thihna lui kai hnuah.

Tunah hrehawm lo thleng mahse,
Ka van in khi ka tlir ang e;
Pathian pawhin ka mittui zawng,
A hru fai ang, ka va lawm dawn!
Thihna lui kai hnuah.
